dict.string: Single Device Mode
Use one device that each player takes turns using to play the game
Multi-Device Mode
Connect up to 4 devices via bluetooth or wifi and play across multiple devices
Select Game Mode
Single Device Mode only requires one device
Multi-Device Mode requires multiple devices (up to 4) connected over a wifi or bluetooth connection.
Game Setup
Select the number of players. Select the number of rounds (every player gets one turn per round).
Select whether you want the first player to draw a picture or type a phrase. Select if you want the first picture/phrase to be auto-generated.
Game Play
After the game is setup, the first player will either draw a picture or type a phrase (depending on what was selected in setup).
Once the first player finishes, they press "Done" and the next player will take their turn. If you are in single device mode, pass the device to the next player.
Game Play (continued)
The next player will be able to see only the previous player's drawing/phrase and will either draw or type during their turn.
What the next player draws/types should describe what the previous player drew/wrote. When he or she is finished, press "Done".
Game Play (continued)
Continue play until all the rounds are completed
View Your Story
When all rounds are completed, scroll through the different images and phrases to see the story you created!

array.string: The black cat slid down the yellow slide
The obese man ate 4 hamburgers all at once
Marcia is a stay at home mom with many children
My shorts were inside out all day and I didn't even know
Maria is an Italian woman who only eats spaghetti
I spilled all the bleach on the rug!
Carl the babysitter loves to take selfies
The school bus drove past my stop
Purple dragons eat kangaroos at tea time
A frustrated Windows user decides to buy a Macbook
Spilling apple juice on your laptop
Dropping your phone in the toilet
Jasmine falls off the magic carpet
My puppy tracked mud all over the kitchen floor
Doug ate an entire pizza in one sitting
Playing guitar on top of a car while stuck in a traffic jam
The teacher has a "Kick Me" sign on his back
Mario and Sonic are best friends
